channel.title: Comments on: Fiat Money vs Blockchain Transfer

item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: Great read. Thank Goodness we have Crypto, as transactions are fast unlike in banks which takes a lot of time
item.content:encoded:
Great read.
Thank Goodness we have Crypto, as transactions are fast unlike in banks which takes a lot of time

item.title: By: Anikys3reasure
item.dc:creator: Anikys3reasure
item.description:
This two can never be compared though! Traditional Banking System and Blockchain Technology, No
I can't explain how much I love Blockchain Technology, Transfer of fiat passes through banks and they can easily tell from who and to who while cryptocurrency transfer is transparent but anonymous. I love crypto more. No Matter what.
item.content:encoded:
This two can never be compared though! Traditional Banking System and Blockchain Technology, No

I can’t explain how much I love Blockchain Technology, Transfer of fiat passes through banks and they can easily tell from who and to who while cryptocurrency transfer is transparent but anonymous. I love crypto more. No Matter what.
